content: thank you to everyone for your help the pattern is now downloadable i am so grateful to this wonderful community for your assistance this is my very first time i ve written up a sock pattern i ve often put together my own textures and cables and lace and provided notes to friends or kept notes for myself i fell in love with this sparkly yarn and thought what i needed most in life in that moment was a pair of sparkly socks they color reminded me of honey so i knit a spin on a honeycomb look the pattern can be sized up / down in repeats of 8
